name: Beef Burger
instructions: In a large bowl, mix the ground beef, salt, pepper, Worcestershire sauce and garlic powder until just combined
Divide the mixture into 4 equal portions and shape each portion into a patty about 1/2 inches thick
Heat a large non-stick pan or griddle over medium heat
Cook the patties for about 4 minutes on each side, or until the internal temperature reaches 73C/160F for well-done patties
Toast the hamburger buns on the griddle or in the oven until golden brown
Assemble the burgers with your desired toppings and serve. This recipe serves two
